text: Today on the West Coast, it's a bit rough with 7 ft @12s W swell and fresh 24 mph SSW winds, making it blown out. Tomorrow, conditions worsen with the same swell height but increasing winds to 29 mph, keeping it messy. Day after, the swell drops to 4 ft @9s WSW, but fresh 32 mph ESE winds will still create challenging conditions. Best: today.
